definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: And yet these things go relatively unnoticed.
sentences.chinese: 這些事情不太引人注意。

sentences.english: Servants don't promote or call attention to themselves.
sentences.chinese: 僕人不會自我宣傳或引人注意。

sentences.english: Why shouldn't she be conspicuous if she chooses?
sentences.chinese: 如果她願意，爲什麼就不能引人注意？

sentences.english: This example is unspectacular but serves as a proof-of-concept.
sentences.chinese: 這個示例並不引人注意，但是提供了概念證明。

sentences.english: The space is dominated by a spellbinding black-and-white photomural.
sentences.chinese: 整個空間最引人注意的是那幅黑白壁畫式照片。

sentences.english: Her flirtatious manners are intended to attract.
sentences.chinese: 她的輕浮舉止是想引人注意。
名人代言是引人注意的。

sentences.english: The echinodermata are furnished with remarkable organs .
sentences.chinese: 棘皮動物具有一種引人注意的器官。

sentences.english: If the big-spoked bicycle type wheels don't snag attention, then steering with a joystick surely will.
sentences.chinese: 該車的操控杆與大的自行車式的輪子一樣引人注意。

sentences.english: True eccentrics never deliberately set out to draw attention to themselves.
sentences.chinese: 真正古怪的人從不有意引人注意。

sentences.english: Another topic which is gathering some attention lately is that of Agile Coaching.
sentences.chinese: 最近另一個引人注意的話題是敏捷教練。

sentences.english: Attention-getting ripped jeans are the denim equivalent of a pick-up line.
sentences.chinese: 穿着引人注意的破洞牛仔褲像是在等人搭訕。

sentences.english: Therefore, they tend to attract attention wherever they go.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他們不管到哪裏都會引人注意。

sentences.english: Providing an attention-getting sound or words before audio presentation.
sentences.chinese: 聽覺演示前提供引人注意的聲音或文字。

sentences.english: Once again we see the power of the ribbon to focus attention.
sentences.chinese: 再次體現絲帶在引人注意方面的潛力。

sentences.english: He leaps out, performs a little jig, and lives another ten years before eventually keeling over.
sentences.chinese: 他引人注意地跳了一小段舞，在死之前又活了十年。

definition: to act ostentatiously/to brag/to show off
attention/to stare at/to fix attention on sth
to steal the show/to grab the limelight
to provoke (esp. annoyance, disgust etc)/to offend/to attract (attention)
